turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a doctor's appointment. I'm a new patient.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. To start, could you please provide your full name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's John Smith, and my date of birth is 03/15/1980. Also, I'd prefer a general physician, not a specialist.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, John. We have several general physicians available. Can you tell me what day of the week and time works best for you to book an appointment? Please note that it may take several days before we can schedule an appointment.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, several days? Okay... Well, I'd prefer sometime next week, and afternoons are best. Does that help narrow things down?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, that does narrow it down. Let me check the availability... It seems Dr. Evans has openings next Tuesday and Thursday afternoons. Would either of those work?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, are either of those days available later in the afternoon, say around 3 or 4 pm? I have some work commitments.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check. Unfortunately, Dr. Evans is only available at 1 pm on Tuesday and Thursday. Alternatively, Dr. Miller has an opening at 3:30 PM on Thursday. Would you like to book with her instead?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Thursday at 3:30 PM with Dr. Miller sounds perfect! Can you confirm that appointment and send me a confirmation?
